title: Hummus Recipe
directions: In a food processor or blender combine all ingredients (minus the pepper)
When in a dish, add a teaspoon of olive oil and the pepper to your taste
Serve with fresh pita or as a side with other lebanese dishes
Garnish with a sprig of fresh parsley
ingredients: 1	19floz (540ml) Can of Chickpeas drained (keep half of the liquid)
1	large clove of garlic (or 2 small) finely chopped
4	tblspn of fresh lemon juice (1 lemon squeezed) (or use realemon)
